ygData.subject: Re: Any good newbie armor quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, when I said I had mostly leather, I meant the look. I actually am only wearing legs and shoes that are truly leather (banded actually... I m a tailor and
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, when I said I had mostly leather, I meant the
look. I actually am only wearing legs and shoes that
are truly leather (banded actually... I'm a tailor
and made them myself).<br><br>A lot of my wisdom
items were givien to me by some friends who like to
hang out at the EC tunnel, and they do pretty well
there. Not my cup of tea tho. I'm not up on how much
stuff goes for, but you can check it on
<a href=http://www.eqprices.com target=new>http://www.eqprices.com</a> I've found them to be pretty
accurate.<br><br>There's a black medallion (not the exact name... like I
said, I'm NOT a equipment junkie) that you should be
able to get. If you can find a jeweler, jasper is our
gem of choice... that's the one that increases
wisdom. If you show up with a silver bar and a jasper,
most jewelers will give you a heavy discount, maybe
even free. Just remember fizzles happen, and you might
lose it if he fizzles.
